text: The Men's team sprint competition at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on 28 February 2018.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The eight fastest teams advance to the first round.Qualifying results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Rank !! Nation !! Time !! Behind !! Notes |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 1 ||align=left| Nils van 't Hoenderdaal Harrie Lavreysen Jeffrey Hoogland || 42.869 || || Q |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 2 ||align=left| François Pervis Sébastien Vigier Quentin Lafargue || 43.389 || +0.520 || Q |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 3 ||align=left| Robert Förstemann Maximilian Levy Joachim Eilers || 43.452 || +0.583 || Q |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 4 ||align=left| Jack Carlin Ryan Owens Joseph Truman || 43.553 || +0.684 || Q |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 5 ||align=left| Ethan Mitchell Sam Webster Eddie Dawkins || 43.736 || +0.867 || Q |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 6 ||align=left| Alexander Sharapov Pavel Yakushevskiy Aleksandr Dubchenko || 43.905 || +1.036 || Q |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 7 ||align=left| Kazuki Amagai Yudai Nitta Kazunari Watanabe || 44.240 || +1.371 || Q |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 8 ||align=left| Pavel Kelemen Martin Čechman Robin Wagner || 44.410 || +1.541 || Q |- | 9 ||align=left| Li Jianxin Luo Yongjia Bi Wenjun || 44.524 || +1.655 || |- | 10 ||align=left| Alejandro Martínez Juan Peralta José Moreno Sánchez || 44.665 || +1.796 || |- | 11 ||align=left| Kevin Quintero Ruben Murillo Santiago Ramírez || 45.137 || +2.268 || |- | 12 ||align=left| Yauhen Veramchuk Artsiom Zaitsau Uladzislau Novik || 45.227 || +2.358 || |- | 13 ||align=left| Rafał Sarnecki Mateusz Rudyk Krzysztof Maksel || REL ~~43.505~~ || || |} * Poland were relegated "for incorrect change" (Art 3.2.153) ===First round=== First round heats were held as follows: Heat 1: 4th v 5th fastest Heat 2: 3rd v 6th fastest Heat 3: 2nd v 7th fastest Heat 4: 1st v 8th fastest The heat winners were ranked on time, from which the top 2 proceed to the gold medal final and the other 2 proceed to the bronze medal final.First round results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !
